mapper.select: SELECT g.pre_sku as preSku, g.`name`, s.color, s.size, og.amount, og.sale_price AS salePrice FROM order_goods og LEFT JOIN stock s ON og.stock_id = s.id LEFT JOIN goods g ON s.goods_id = g.id where og.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT g.sku, g.`name`, s.color, s.size, og.amount, og.sale_price AS salePrice, og.subtotal_money as subtotalMoney, g.discount, c.`name` as customerName, c.address as customerAddress, c.mobile as customerMoblie, u.user_name AS inputUser FROM `order` o INNER JOIN order_goods og ON o.id = og.order_id LEFT JOIN stock s on s.id = og.stock_id LEFT JOIN goods g ON s.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON o.input_user = u.id LEFT JOIN customer c on o.buyer = c.id WHERE o.id = #{orderId}

SELECT g.sku,g.name,s.color FROM `order` o INNER JOIN order_goods og ON o.id = og.order_id LEFT JOIN stock s ON s.id = og.stock_id LEFT JOIN goods g ON s.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON o.input_user = u.id LEFT JOIN customer c ON o.buyer = c.id WHERE o.id = #{orderId} GROUP BY g.sku,g.name,s.color
